title: Component Interactions
description: Interactive behaviors triggered by user actions or page events

x-specs.given: a component with only hover interactions
x-specs.then: it should support hover effects without other interaction types

x-specs.given: a component with only click interactions
x-specs.then: it should support click actions without other interaction types

x-specs.given: a component with only scroll interactions
x-specs.then: it should support scroll animations without other interaction types

x-specs.given: a component with only entrance interactions
x-specs.then: it should support entrance animations without other interaction types

x-specs.given: a button with hover and click interactions
x-specs.then: it should support both hover effects and click actions

x-specs.given: a component with entrance and scroll interactions
x-specs.then: it should play entrance animation on load and scroll animation on viewport entry

x-specs.given: a component with all four interaction types (hover, click, scroll, entrance)
x-specs.then: all interactions should work independently and not interfere with each other

x-specs.given: a button with hover transform and click navigation
x-specs.then: hover effect should apply immediately and click should navigate after animation
